CustomField.description: The field that holds the value of a special condition that determines button settings. Based relative to the Case Payment object, requires dot notation when necessary. Ex 1: custom field "Foo" on the Case_Payment__c object - Enter "Foo__c". Ex 2: custom field "Bar" on the DIR_Case__c object - Enter "Case__r.Bar__c".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the field relative to the Case Payment object that holds the special condition that determines button settings. Ex: custom field "Foo" on the DIR_Case__c object - enter "Case__r.Foo__c".
CustomField.label: Condition Field
